  • Method Details

    • saveTransaction

      private Transaction saveTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      This method saves a transaction into the DB
      Parameters:
      transaction - is the transaction to save.
      Returns:
      the saved transaction, with the correct id.

    • makeATransaction

      public Transaction makeATransaction(Account fromAccount, Account toAccount, @Nullable String description, float amount, Account feesAccount)
      Create and save a transaction object into the DB. This transaction is a money transfer between two paymybuddy accounts.
      Parameters:
      fromAccount - is the account on which the money is taken from.
      toAccount - is the account on which the money is transferred to.
      description - is an optional description of the transaction.
      amount - is the amount of th transaction.
      feesAccount -
      Returns:
      the saved transaction into the DB, with its proper id.

    • makeAnAccountCredit

      public AccountCredit makeAnAccountCredit(Account account, float amount, String description, String creditCardNumber, String crypto, String expirationDate)
      This method create an account credit object, make the money transfer and saves the record into the database. (The money transfer is a POF, it does not really make any REAL money transfer... yet...)
      Parameters:
      account - is the account the money in transferred to.
      amount - is the amount of money transferred to the account.
      description - is an optional description for the transfer.
      creditCardNumber - is the credit card number from which you want to take money.
      crypto - is the credit card cryptogram
      expirationDate - is the credit card expiration date.
      Returns:
      a saved account credit object corresponding to the record of this type of transaction into the database.

    • saveAccountCredit

      private AccountCredit saveAccountCredit(AccountCredit accountCreditToSave)

    • applyFees

      private Transaction applyFees(Account fromAccount, Account feesAccount, float amount, float rate, @Nullable String description)
      This method is used to apply fees to a transaction between two paymybuddy accounts.
      Parameters:
      fromAccount - is the account on which the fees are applied.
      feesAccount - is the fees account of pay my buddy app.
      amount - corresponds to the amount of money on which fees are applied.
      rate - is the fees' rate. i.e : 5% fees is 0.05f rate.
      description - is an optional description for the fees.
      Returns:
      is the transaction object saved into the database with its proper id.

    • getPageByAccount

      public Paged<Transaction> getPageByAccount(int pageNumber, int size, Account account)
      This method is used to recover all the transactions made from an account in a paged format.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - is the number of the page you want to access to.
      size - is the size of the page you want to display.
      account - is the account on which you want to get the transactions.
      Returns:
      a paged transaction object.
